repos.title: AthenaAI
repos.description: AthenaAI is an innovative, advanced platform utilizing the Opus model to simulate interactive characters. AthenaAI combines cutting-edge AI technology with character emulation. This dynamic, customizable AI solution for conversations transforms virtual interactions, making them as close to real conversations as possible.

repos.title: AudioAnalyzers
repos.description: A professional web-based audio analysis and mixing tool that allows you to visualize and process audio tracks in real-time. Features include waveform visualization, spectrum analysis, and separate control over instrumental and vocal tracks.
repos.featuredReason: Advanced audio processing tool demonstrating expertise in web audio technologies

repos.title: Flask_CalculationWizard
repos.description: FlaskWebsite_UserData is a web application developed using the Flask microframework for Python. The primary focus of this project is to provide a user-friendly platform for user registration, login, and data management. The application utilizes JSON files to store both user authentication information and user-specific data.

repos.title: KVRT_AutoUpdater
repos.description: Automate the updating process of the Kaspersky Virus Removal Tool.

repos.title: MindustryExecutable
repos.description: MindustryExecutable simplifies launching Mindustry with preconfigured executables, streamlining the process. The package includes files that automatically start the game, removing the need for manual setup or extra installations.

repos.title: PortableBlenderManager
repos.description: PortableBlenderManager is a tool for Blender's portable edition, focusing on cleaning up data post-use and saving configurations in the script's folder for efficient workflow management.
repos.featuredReason: Innovative tool for managing Blender configurations and workspace

repos.title: PythonModules
repos.description: PythonModules is a repository housing a curated set of reusable Python modules. Easily import these modules into your projects to access a range of functionalities, from utilities to specialized tools. Simplify your development process and contribute to the growing collection of modules to foster collaborative coding.

repos.title: Terminality
repos.description: This Python script generates a customized console prompt with user, host, directory, and Git branch info.

repos.title: VermiNew
repos.description: Config files for my GitHub profile.

repos.title: Verminew.github.io
repos.featuredReason: My portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills in modern web development
